checkout-options: On Rapido.com, you can checkout with the following trusted payment options. Each payment option will be described below.
buy-cards-online: Rapido.com: Buy your favorite Gift Cards online | Fast Email Delivery
look-at-faqs: Take a look at the FAQ's
paypal_text_1: You can pay with PayPal on Rapido.com. After selecting this payment option, you log into your PayPal account and confirm the payment. Next, the transaction is processed.
paypal_text_2: Upon receipt of payment, the top up voucher code is sent immediately.
visa_and_mastercard_text_1: On Rapido.com, you can pay via VISA credit card, VISA debit card (Delta and Electron) and MasterCard. At the checkout, you select payment by credit card. Then you enter your credit card details, including the card holder, the card number, expiration date and CVV code. Then confirm payment.
visa_and_mastercard_text_2: Upon receipt of payment, the top up code is sent immediately.

error.error_text: It looks like the page you would like to see no longer exists, sorry
